werckmeisteriii.name: Werckmeister III (1691)
werckmeisteriii.source:
{
  const pythComma = aa1 - M2
  const flatFif = P5 - pythComma / 4
  P5 white 'C'
  P5 white 'G'
  flatFif white 'D'
  P5 white 'A'
  P5 white 'E'
  P5 white 'B'
  P5 black 'F♯'
  P5 black 'C♯'
  P5 black 'G♯'
  flatFif black 'D♯'
  flatFif black 'A♯'
  stack()
  P8 white 'F'
  reduce()
  sort()
  cents(£, 3)
}

young1799.source:

700.1 white 'G'

697.9 black 'D♯'
697.9 black 'A♯'
stack()

1200. 'F'
reduce()
sort()

12edo.source:

200. white 'B'
300. white 'C'
400. black 'C♯'
500. white 'D'
600. black 'E♭'
700. white 'E'
800. white 'F'
900. black 'F♯'
1000. white 'G'
1100. black 'G♯'
1200. white 'A'

partch43.name: Harry Partch 43-tone
partch43.source:
1 gray:15:21:27:33
/1 black:15:21:27:33

5 olive:21:27:81
/5 gold:21:27:81

oddLimit(11) white

organize()

carlossuperjust.source:

[white, yellow, blue, white, lavender, chocolate, yellow, indigo]
1/3 white
3/5 green
5/3 yellow
2/1 white
organize()

insert(7/5 cyan)
